code:
import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='/api/persons';var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(baseUrl).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newNameNumber){return axios.post(baseUrl,newNameNumber).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,newNumber){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newNumber).then(function(response){return response.data;});};// eslint-disable-next-line
export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update};
